title: [Australian Children's TV Promo 1995]
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children in motion pictures

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs for children
abstract: A short promotional film highlighting the ACTF's popular Children's TV programs up to 1995.
description: Well loved and popular ACTF TV series are showcased in short clips and include 'Round the Twist', 'Lift Off', 'Sky Trackers', 'Boy Soldiers', 'Captain Johnno' and 'Touch the Sun'.
